<script>
(function() {
  var correct = "test123";  
  var maxTries = 3;
  var lockMinutes = 10;      
  var now = Date.now();

  // ‰ªé localStorage ÂèñÂá∫‰πãÂâçÁöÑÂ§±Ë¥•ËÆ∞ÂΩï
  var failData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("news_fail")) || {count:0, lockedUntil:0};

  if (now < failData.lockedUntil) {
    document.write("<h2 style='text-align:center;margin-top:20%;color:#c00;font-family:sans-serif;'>‚õî Access Denied<br>Too many failed attempts.<br>Please try again later.</h2>");
    document.close();
  } else {
    failData.count = 0; 
    localStorage.setItem("news_fail", JSON.stringify(failData));

    var ok = false;
    for (var i = 0; i < maxTries; i++) {
      var input = prompt("üîí This page is under testing. Please enter password ("+(maxTries - i)+" attempts left):");
      if (input === correct) {
        ok = true;
        break;
      } else {
        failData.count++;
      }
    }

    if (!ok) {
      failData.lockedUntil = now + lockMinutes * 60 * 1000;
      localStorage.setItem("news_fail", JSON.stringify(failData));
      document.write("<h2 style='text-align:center;margin-top:20%;color:#c00;font-family:sans-serif;'>‚õî Access Denied<br>Too many failed attempts.<br>Please try again in "+lockMinutes+" minutes.</h2>");
      document.close();
    }
  }
})();
</script>
